description: Detects programs on a Windows system that should not write executables to disk
author: frack113
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Legitimate Application Dropped Executable
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ee][Qq][Nn][Ee][Dd][Tt]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Oo][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp][Ii][Mm][Gg][Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Dd][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ee][Ss][Ee][Nn][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Aa][Cc][Rr][Oo][Rr][Dd]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Dd][Rr][Cc][Ee][Ff]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Hh][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ff][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\.[Oo][Cc][Xx]/))
